Detailed Description

collection of information about an application.

Registers applications names/versions to be printed and to be searched for (discovery). Each application gets a name which will be printed at system start up. Each application has an optional applicationID number which can be used by other applications to find it and to determine if it was loaded/linked or not.

static Application* RODOS::Application::findApplication ( const int32_t  id) [static]

If the list contains an application with the given id then this functions returns a pointer to this application. If there is more than one application with that id, this function returns a pointer to the first one it encounters. In any other case this methode returns null. (do not call before main())

Parameters:
[in]idThe id to search for.
Returns:
pointer to application with given id or null if not found.
